system.effect: When Performing the "Adjust Speed and Bearing", "Come to a New Heading", or "Evasive Manoeuver" Manoeuvre Actions, Pilot (Space Craft) + Manoeuvrability Tests are +0. (instead of -20, -10, and -10 Respectively). Only one per vessel.
